definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
to take part in an election/to run for office
price competition/bid (in an auction)/to compete on price/to bid against sb
to try to answer a question (in a quiz, guessing game, riddle etc)/quiz game
rowing competition/boat race/swimming competition (e.g. to cross river or lake)

sentences.english: Hypocrisy is also at play in how Bernanke and his Chinese counterparts are embroiled in a race to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克与其中国对手的竞次之争不也是一种虚伪么。

sentences.english: The former Atletico Madrid keeper is wasting little time becoming integrated at United and adapting to his new surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 前马竞门将正在尝试融入球队，并与新队友配合。

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Diploma in Electrical Engineering, Haking Wong Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升读黄克竞分校电机工程文凭课程二年级。

sentences.english: Under freezing sky creatures contend in freedom.
The Reds' new No. 17 was also welcomed to Merseyside by former Atletico teammate Fernando Torres.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦新任17号同样受到前马竞队友托雷斯的欢迎。

sentences.english: The possibility of Reyes coming to Atletico doesn't exist.
sentences.chinese: 雷耶斯来马竞的可能性已经不复存在。

sentences.english: Pink peach spring race, who were makeup language.
sentences.chinese: 桃红李白竞春光，谁共残妆语。

sentences.english: Maxi 7 - Of all the four forwards, the Argentinian probably had the least input in what was a good day for the Atleti frontmen.
sentences.chinese: 所有的前风中，马克西似乎是马竞贡献最少的一个。

sentences.english: Jingtian & Gongcheng did not respond to requests for comment by press time.
sentences.chinese: 截至发稿时间，竞天公诚为对置评请求作出回应。

sentences.english: The Wongs couldn't be reached for comment.
sentences.chinese: 记者目前无法获得王勤竞夫妇的相关评论。

sentences.english: Atletico Madrid are ready to drop their interest in Auxerre winger Kanga Akale.
sentences.chinese: 马竞已经准备放弃他们所感兴趣的边锋球员阿卡尼。

sentences.english: And I was with you in weakness, and in fear, and in much trembling.
sentences.chinese: 我在你们那里，又软弱，又惧怕，又甚战竞。

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Diploma in Travel and Tourism, Haking Wong Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升读黄克竞分校旅游业务文凭课程二年级。

sentences.english: This time the difference was about more than Atlético's existential angst.
sentences.chinese: 这次的区别还在于马竞的存在感焦虑以外的东西。

definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
to entertain/to repay/to return/to reward/to compensate/to reply/to answer
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to run fast/to speed/to gallop/to disseminate/to spread
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to ride (a horse)/to go on horseback
